Package nl.weeaboo.vn.scene

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAxisAlignedContainer
    Layout group which transforms its children with an x/y offset, but no rotation.
    IButton
    Clickable button.
    IButtonModel
    State for button-like objects.
    IButtonRenderer
    Renderer for IButton.
    IColorizable
    Interface for objects which can be tinted with a color.
    IDrawable
    Renderable element.
    IGridPanel
    Panel with grid layout.
    IImageDrawable
    Simple renderable element.
    ILayer
    Group of visual elements.
    IPanel
    Panels apply a layout algorithm to their child elements.
    IPositionable
    Interface for manipulating bounds (x, y, width, height).
    IRenderable
    Rendering logic for a IDrawable.
    IScreen
    Top-level container for the visual elements in a IContext.
    IScreenTextState
    Global textbox-related state for a IScreen.
    IScrollable
    Scrollable element.
    ITextDrawable
    Drawable text element.
    ITransformable
    Sub-interface of IDrawable which allows arbitrary matrix-based transformations.
    IViewport
    Viewport clips the rendering of its children to its own bounds.
    IVisualElement
    Renderable element.
    IVisualGroup
    Group of visual elements.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ButtonViewState
    State of a IButton.
